data.eml:eml: A new species of Neoseiulella (Acari: Phytoseiidae) from the Macaronesian Region, Canary Islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Estévez, María Lourdes Moraza Miguel Á Ngel Peña (2006): A new species of Neoseiulella (Acari: Phytoseiidae) from the Macaronesian Region, Canary Islands. Zootaxa 1366: 55-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174812
